Helpers¶

With the plugin Helpers you can seamlessly style various html elements. If any have been missed please feel free to create an issue on bitbucket and we’ll endeavour to add them.

Styles¶

  • Form Elements, including submit buttons
  • Crumblists
  • Pagination
  • Buttons, Progress bars
  • Flash messages error, info, warning & success are styled as dismissable alerts

More¶

  • Flash
  • Form
  • Html
